Package templeengine.src.core

Class GameCamera

  • java.lang.Object
    • templeengine.src.core.GameCamera

  • public class GameCamera
extends java.lang.Object
    The GameCamera class provides the user with the main camera the game uses.

    With this class you can easily set bounds for the camera (in which the camera has to be in), and position the camera as well.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      GameCamera​(double cWidth, double cHeight)
      Constructs the camera with the given dimensions.
